name: uns-kit
description: Monorepo for the UNS toolkit (core runtime and plugin packages)

scripts.py:lint: cd packages/uns-py && poetry run ruff check .
scripts.py:sandbox: cd packages/uns-py && poetry install && poetry run uns-kit-py create ../../sandbox-app-py
scripts.py:sandbox:load-test: cd sandbox-app-py && POETRY_VIRTUALENVS_IN_PROJECT=true poetry install && poetry add -e ../packages/uns-py && poetry run python src/load_test.py
scripts.py:sandbox:data-example: cd sandbox-app-py && POETRY_VIRTUALENVS_IN_PROJECT=true poetry install && poetry add -e ../packages/uns-py && poetry run python src/data_example.py
scripts.py:configure:devops: cd packages/uns-py && poetry run uns-kit-py configure-devops ../../sandbox-app-py
scripts.py:configure:vscode: cd packages/uns-py && poetry run uns-kit-py configure-vscode ../../sandbox-app-py
scripts.py:configure:workspace: cd packages/uns-py && poetry run uns-kit-py configure-workspace ../../sandbox-app-py
scripts.py:configure: cd packages/uns-py && poetry run uns-kit-py configure-devops ../../sandbox-app-py && poetry run uns-kit-py configure-vscode ../../sandbox-app-py && poetry run uns-kit-py configure-workspace ../../sandbox-app-py
scripts.py:pull-request: cd packages/uns-py && poetry run uns-kit-py pull-request ../../sandbox-app-py
scripts.ts:sandbox:data: cd sandbox-app && pnpm exec tsx src/examples/data-example.ts
scripts.ts:sandbox:load-test: cd sandbox-app && pnpm exec tsx src/examples/load-test-data.ts
scripts.ts:sandbox:table: cd sandbox-app && pnpm exec tsx src/examples/table-example.ts
scripts.ts:sandbox:api: cd sandbox-app && pnpm exec tsx src/examples/api-example.ts
scripts.ts:sandbox:cron: cd sandbox-app && pnpm exec tsx src/examples/cron-example.ts
scripts.ts:sandbox:uns-gateway-cli: cd sandbox-app && pnpm exec tsx src/examples/uns-gateway-cli.ts
scripts.ts:configure:devops: pnpm exec tsx packages/uns-cli/src/index.ts configure-devops sandbox-app
scripts.ts:configure:vscode: pnpm exec tsx packages/uns-cli/src/index.ts configure-vscode sandbox-app
scripts.ts:configure:codegen: pnpm exec tsx packages/uns-cli/src/index.ts configure-codegen sandbox-app
scripts.ts:configure:api: pnpm exec tsx packages/uns-cli/src/index.ts configure-api sandbox-app
scripts.ts:configure:cron: pnpm exec tsx packages/uns-cli/src/index.ts configure-cron sandbox-app
scripts.ts:configure:templates: pnpm exec tsx packages/uns-cli/src/index.ts configure-templates sandbox-app
scripts.ts:configure:temporal: pnpm exec tsx packages/uns-cli/src/index.ts configure-temporal sandbox-app
scripts.ts:configure:python: pnpm exec tsx packages/uns-cli/src/index.ts configure-python sandbox-app
scripts.ts:configure:uns-reference: pnpm exec tsx packages/uns-cli/src/index.ts configure-uns-reference sandbox-app

author: Aljosa Vister
